creditline: Gift of James Ford and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
description: Portrait of William Collins. Arms folded, turned three-quarters towards spectator. Dark, disshveled hair, and sideburns. Dark eyes, under heavy dark eyebrows; looks directly at spectator. Black coat with high white waistcoat and neckcloth. Solid, dark grey background.
title: Portrait of William Collins
